Step 6
Terms & Conditions
Click on the map, then zoom and drag until the cursor points to your workspace.

Add terms and conditions for every listing type

Please indicate the types of listings that are presented in your room. You will then need to provide terms & conditions for all types of listings.
You should offer at least 1 listing type
